content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
───────────────────
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map. Multiple attempts were made to craft and place a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5), but none succeeded because the Lab item was unavailable. Instead, processing operations were carried out using pre‐existing smelting facilities (for example, a furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) for iron smelting and a copper furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0) for copper processing). These facilities are accessed for resource conversion but were not constructed by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Call Parameter Issues – Incorrect use of get_entities():
  - Avoid using unsupported keyword arguments like "radius".
  - Do not pass positional parameters if the function expects none; verify the function signature before calling.
  
• Entity Availability and Placement Problems
  - Ensure that an entity (e.g. Lab) is available in the inventory before attempting placement.
  
• Iteration Over Undefined Collections
  - Check that objects returned (for example, from get_entities) are not None before iterating; use a fallback to an empty list if necessary.
  
• Crafting and Resource Chain Shortfalls
  - Confirm that all required sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, and copper-cable) are available or can be produced before starting complex crafting.
  - Validate resource counts and production prerequisites (like sufficient smelted products) to support crafting recipes and avoid cascading failures.
